uvi.description:
atm: iphase: fix possible use-after-free in ia_module_exit()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.276 by commit a832ee2f2145f57443b2d565f8cb5490e8339f42. For more details please see the references link.
